event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The Message ID:   %MSGID% indicates a diagnosis has determined that one of the cores in the multi-thread processor contains a faulty resource. The diagnosis determined the impact of the fault is localized to a single thread that is being removed from service. However, the faulty resource is shared by all four threads in the core. There is the potential for the other threads sharing this resource to experience an error. It is recommended that the system administrator contact Sun support and arrange for the replacement of the affected component.

The physical thread number reported by the fault manager may not be the same as the logical thread number reported by Solaris. In the example below, the physical thread number is 8 while the logical thread number is 4. 

# fmdump -v -u fc4ac2b0-d5f0-c4ab-8fd8-bf3d542d2f83
